cves.description: A blind time-based SQL injection exists in the Service Dependencies page. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary SQL via the keys of the select[] POST array parameter vulnerability in Centreon Centreon Infra Monitoring on Linux (Service Dependencies modules) allows allowing full database extraction.This issue affects Centreon Infra Monitoring: 25.10; 24.10;24.04.
problemType: A blind time-based SQL injection exists in the Service Dependencies page. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary SQL via the keys of the select[] POST array parameter
